basics.name: Mark Evans
basics.summary:
An experienced Enterprises Security Architect, experienced at working with and advising customers from C level, down to the detailed technical SMEs, adapting his content and delivery as appropriate for the audience.  Over 23 years of industry experience, predominantly in secure systems design and architecture.
Strong focus on Digital Transformation, Cloud Security and Information/Business Centric Security.  With experience from both Cloud consumer and provider perspectives.
Mark has an extensive Cyber Security knowledge base, backed up by an ability to learn and adapt quickly to new technology/industry areas.
Passionate about sharing his knowledge and helping develop new talent.  Represented HPE on the industry committee, led by TechUK, defining the specification for a Cyber Security Degree Apprenticeship.
